reviews.review_msg: If you are ready to work your hardest and show an interest, this professor will bend over backwards for you. She is knowledgeable and always there for her students, so long as they put their best foot forward. I am so thankful to have been taught by her! She will change the way you learn and live.

Kate is a great Professor. She's always helpful and gives a ton of feedback. All of the lectures were interesting, and she even made Ulysses approachable. She's also a very fair marker, though she may mark a little on the easy side. She's pretty cute too.
Great prof. Has interesting things to say. But her markings is hard. Lovely lady. =)

I tried so hard to be nice and form a rapport, and she was nothing but unpleasant. Her own opinions are the only right ones and she made it clear that if we disagreed we were wrong. She needs to realise that just because she dislikes something doesn't make us wrong for disagreeing. HORRIBLE prof. Avoid at all costs.

Nadine disguises herself as a kindergarden teacher. Everything is cutesy and candy coated. Then she marks your essays and if you say anything that strays from her ideas about the novel you fail. This in a prof is deplorable.

An unpleasant experience. Gives useful handouts and makes some insightful comments. However, she calls herself a "fair marker" but is very, very critical. Average for in-class essay was a C. Showed class a student's paper as a bad example. Time management could use some work-shows up late or gets sidetracked. I'm avoiding her for future classes.
A total wanker.  An embarrassingly bad IT-guy-turned English-professor who shouldn't have made the jump.  At the very least, after listening to this guy you'll feel much better about yourself.
my class with stephen totally stank...I leave it feeling as if I wasted my time.
Had a fantastic time in his class. I've never had a prof. enjoy teaching a class as much as he did. I would recommend his classes to all students.
